original_title: フェイクプラスティックプラネット
overview: A 25 years old homeless girl, Shiho, living in an internet cafe, runs into a blind fortune teller, who insists that they had met 25 years ago. Figuring out who that actually was, turns out to be a journey in search for her identity.
tagline: The world is made of lies...
title: Fake Plastic Planet
